wikipedia_page.main:
Stanley Caine (born Stanley Victor Micklewhite; October 1935 – 13 January 2013) was an English actor and the younger brother of actor Sir Michael Caine. He was known for his role as "Coco" in The Italian Job, a film released in 1969 starring Michael.
In addition to his older brother Michael, Stanley had an older maternal half-brother David whom Stan and Michael only knew of after their mother's death in 1989. Their half-brother died in 1992.
Caine was diagnosed with leukaemia in early 2008. He died in his sleep in January 2013 in Ruislip, West London.

response: * Stanley Caine as German Officer, Stanley is the younger brother of Michael Caine.
